Text.Page:
It was a few days ago. I saw members of the Free Brotherhood just...turn into monsters. I know it sounds strange, but they placed these stones all around the ground here.

Can you take a look at them and maybe see what they're for?
(As you touch the obelisk, a small black rock falls out.)

So...this is it? This is just a rock.

Oh, but...I do feel sort of sick holding it. That must be the foul energy within it.

I know how to dispose of this. Thank you, , for what you've done.
